General.Name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
General.Description: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited provides integrated utilities products and services in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Water Business, Power Business, and Holding Company segments. The company procures and distributes raw and industrial water; and provides wastewater treatment services to operators in industrial estates and industrial lands, as well as other consumers. It also generates and distributes electricity with gas, coal, water, solar, and waste to energy as sources. The company was formerly known as Hemaraj Clean Water Company Limited and changed its name to WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in August 2016. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Samut Prakarn, Thailand. WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WHA Industrial Development Public Company Limited.
